title: NIRVANA (feat. PARK JIMIN)
lyrics:
Why do u love me baby
Why do u love me baby
Oh baby do u really love me? woo
Hell ye2yeeh
Oh baby do u really love me? woo
Hell ye2yeeh

changbakk usan-e mul-i tteol-eojil ttae

meol-eojin yes aein daesin-e nae eolgul-i tteooleun geuttae

jedaelo kkaedal-ass-eo I really fu fuckin myself

manse na honja bamsae naleul salanghal su iss-eo

jugobadgo nugun nal tto tto

ganeumhal su eobsneun geolieseo nal hulyeochigo kkakkgo

nae apgil-eul mag-abogopaseo andal nass-eo

geulaedo rhyme so tight nan

nae neukkim-i ganeun daelo gyesog baet-eodaeni

neukkim-i namdalla

geuchil li eobsji nal hyanghan banhang

nae penchog-eun tto gwangchaeleul balsan

dal-ui goyoga yeong-gam doeneun bam

daeche insaeng-e silpaega eodissnya

seong-gong-i anilamyeon gyohun-iya

gaja jeo kkum neomeoui kkum nirvana

Why do u love me baby

Why do u love me baby

Oh baby do u really love me? woo

Hell ye2yeeh

Oh baby do u really love me? woo

Hell ye2yeeh

nal balabwado seolleeooneun ileon neukkim

nado cheoeum-iya nan oelowohal sigan-e geoul-eul bwa

I love myself oh yeah yeah

Woo look at me look at me look at me look

kkeutnae naega daemileul jangsighaneun kkum

kkaeeonado kkum-ila kkaeeonaneun kkum

So good it feels like a dolphin brrr

nae jeolban-eun jam-igo jeolban hyeonsil-e dugonaseo

pal geodgo hustle ye

kkochpiul ttaekkaji dreamin’ dreamin’

ige yeotae geulin nae geulim-ui uimi

Woo ye ne meosdaelo golla meog-eodo dwae

eum-ag-eun bupe

wae yeonsin eolgul-eul ssillugdae

geuge ne munje nuguui mudaedeun

judung-ileul sugundaeneun ge ne sugjego

bunjaeng-ui uimin muuimilaneun jeung-geo

bulmangwa chwihyang-i chulcheoin nonlideul-eun jib-eochiwo

Now look at me if you’re looking for perfection

nae jeseuchyeoneun jasin-i neomchyeo geulae mulie seokk-yeo

bul-an-eul gyeokkneun geon moduga geochyeoganeun gwajeong-igo

nan dulyeoum-eul beosgyeo

yeoljeong jasingam-eul begae wie jeogsyeoseo

naleul midgo bal-eul meolli ppeod-eo

kkum neomeoui kkum nirvana ye

Why do u love me baby

Why do u love me baby

Oh baby do u really love me? woo

Hell ye2yeeh

Oh baby do u really love me? woo

Hell ye2yeeh

ijeya kkaedal-ass-eo naega naleul salanghaeya

nam-i naleul salanghandaneun geol

moduui salang balajido anh-a

daman na namankeum-eun nal salanghaeya haneun beob

Woo I love fuckin’ myself yeah

Woo I love fuckin’ myself yeah

Why do u love me baby

Why do u love me baby

Oh baby do u really love me? woo

Hell ye2yeeh

Oh baby do u really love me? woo

Hell ye2yeeh

nal balabwado seolleeooneun ileon neukkim

nado cheoeum-iya nan oelowohal sigan-e geoul-eul bwa

I love myself oh yeah yeah
